summary: Defense contractors are targets for hackers who are trying to access sensitive data. The Department of Defense is working on a framework to certify that contractors have proper cybersecurity practices in place to protect data. DOD worked with industry and experts on the framework. However, its plans to start certifying contractors are delayed, and DOD hasn't communicated key details for defense contractors, such as reciprocity...
title: Defense Contractor Cybersecurity: Stakeholder Communication and Performance Goals Could Improve Certification Framework
